items.title: Single Sign-On System and DevOps (Final Year Internship Thesis)
items.description: Secure web client application with SSO system. Authorized token with OAuth2.0. Record user session, applications and device activity status. CI/CD, GitLab, Docker, Nginx and Jenkins for automated deployment.

items.title: E-Commerce Management System
items.description: E-commerce platform built with ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and ExpressJS. Using MongoDB database with GitLab version control and JWT Authentication.

items.title: Delivery Service Management System (Year4 Internship Thesis)
items.description: UI Design with Figma. Using ReactJS and Integrate REST API ExpressJS. Build QR-Code on mobile device use React-Native.

items.title: Accessories Store Management System
items.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with VueJS frontend, Laravel backend, MySQL database, and hosted on Hostinger.

items.title: GIC Coffee Management System
items.description: Coffee shop management system with Java Spring Boot backend, MySQL database, Spring Security implementation, and HTML/Tailwind CSS frontend.

items.title: Microservices Project
items.description: Modern microservices architecture with Java 21+, Spring Boot, Maven. Containerized with Docker and Docker Compose. Orchestrated with Kubernetes (Minikube, kubectl). OAuth2 security with planned Keycloak integration.
